txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.

Wanted: Broken daggers from the goblins on the outskirts of the Shire. Bounders are looking for proof of those who are assisting them in keeping the Shire safe. Deliver the items to Hal Hornblower at Hobbiton centre.
'Goblins and brigands have never been my favourite sort of folk. Certainly not as friendly as yourself.\n\n'Thank you, kindly.'
'Seems that there are more brigands and goblins out there trying to upset the Shire.'
Hal Hornblower wants broken daggers. Hal can be found near the stable in the centre of Hobbiton.
Deliver the broken daggers to Hal Hornblower in Hobbiton
You have accepted a task to acquire broken daggers for the Bounders of the Shire. They have deputized Hal Hornblower to collect the items near the stables in Hobbiton.
Wanted: Broken daggers from the goblins on the outskirts of the Shire.
